locations.name: Paragon Shopping Centre
locations.description: The Paragon is a luxury shopping complex located in the Orchard Road area of Singapore.

locations.name: ION Orchard
locations.description: ION Orchard, formerly known as the Orchard Turn Development or Orchard Turn Site, is a shopping mall in Singapore, next to Orchard MRT station.

locations.name: The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands
locations.description: The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands is Southeast Asiaâ€™s premiere luxury retail destination.

locations.name: VivoCity
locations.description: VivoCity is a shopping mall located in the HarbourFront precinct of Bukit Merah, Singapore. It is the largest shopping mall in Singapore, with 99,987 square metres of net lettable area and 142,854 square metres of gross floor area spread over a three-storey shopping complex and two basement levels.

locations.name: IMM
locations.description: The International Merchandising Mart Mall is an outlet mall owned by CapitaLand Mall Trust, located in Jurong East, Singapore. Opened in 1991, it is a five-storey mall with 961,281 square feet of retail space.

locations.name: 313@somerset
locations.description: Modern, multi-floor mall offering a range of familiar international retailers, with dining options.

locations.name: Westgate
locations.description: Westgate is a lifestyle and family shopping mall in Jurong East, Singapore. It is located close to Jurong East MRT station and Jurong East Bus Interchange. It is also connected with another shopping mall called Jem.

locations.name: Tampines 1
locations.description: Tampines 1 is a shopping mall located in the east of Singapore next to the Tampines MRT station. The mall opened on 1 April 2009.

locations.name: Jem
locations.description: Jem is a suburban mall in Jurong East, Singapore. The mall is directly connected to Jurong East MRT station and close to Jurong East Bus Interchange. It is also located adjacent to another mall called Westgate.

locations.name: Mandarin Gallery
locations.description: Sophisticated retail venue offering designer boutiques, refined cafes & stylish restaurants.

locations.name: Takashimaya Shopping Centre
locations.description: Shopping mall featuring international brands, dining options & the Takashimaya department store.
